dc_title_s: Gambling involvement and problem gambling in Manitoba 2001 [Canada]
dc_description_s: This is an omnibus prevalence survey that examines gambling in various populations in Manitoba, including adolescent, adult, senior, women, and First Nation samples (n=3,119). The adult survey serves as a CPGI baseline study for this population as this instrument, as well as the SOGS, was utilized to discriminate gambler sub-types.
